traceability-requests-incoming.message: We need detailed information about the organic cotton fabric used in our running shoe upper material for our upcoming sustainability report.
Please provide recycling process details and environmental impact data for the recycled materials.

traceability-requests-outgoing.message: We need detailed farming practices and certification documentation for the organic cotton supplied to us.

assessment-templates.description: Assessment template for evaluating environmental impact of recycled materials

questions.text: What is the source material for recycling?

assessment-templates.description: General assessment for supply chain transparency and traceability

questions.text: Who are your direct suppliers for this material?
Can you provide supplier certification documents?
What is the country of origin for this material?
Can you trace this material back to its source?

assessments.title: Organic Cotton Farming Assessment - Natural Fibers Co
assessments.description: Assessment of organic cotton farming practices for Natural Fibers Co
assessments.creator: Sarah Johnson

responses.questionText: What farming methods are used for cotton cultivation?
What is the annual water consumption per hectare for cotton cultivation?
Are any synthetic pesticides or fertilizers used?
Describe the cotton ginning and processing methods used
responses.answer: Traditional mechanical ginning process using roller gins to separate cotton fibers from seeds. No chemical treatments are applied during ginning. The process is powered by renewable solar energy.

responses.questionText: What chemicals are used in the cotton processing?
responses.answer: No chemicals are used in our processing. We use only mechanical separation and natural air drying.

assessments.title: Recycled Polyester Environmental Impact - EcoFiber Processing
assessments.description: Environmental impact assessment for recycled polyester production
assessments.creator: Michael Chen

responses.questionText: What is the source material for recycling?
responses.answer: Post-consumer plastic bottles (PET) collected from municipal recycling programs across Japan

responses.questionText: What percentage of the final product is recycled content?
Describe the recycling process and any chemical treatments used
responses.answer: PET bottles are mechanically shredded, washed with biodegradable detergents, melted and extruded into polyester fibers. Minimal chemical processing with eco-friendly catalysts.

responses.questionText: What is the energy consumption for the recycling process (kWh per kg)?
responses.answerText: 12.5 kWh per kg of recycled polyester

assessments.title: Supply Chain Transparency - GreenTech Materials
assessments.description: Transparency assessment for supplier verification and traceability
assessments.creator: Emma Rodriguez

responses.questionText: Who are your direct suppliers for this material?
responses.answer: Natural Fibers Co (org-003) for organic cotton, EcoFiber Processing (org-004) for recycled components

responses.questionText: Can you provide supplier certification documents?
What is the country of origin for this material?
Can you trace this material back to its source?

assessments.title: Cotton Processing Compliance Assessment
assessments.description: Follow-up assessment for cotton processing compliance verification
assessments.creator: James Wilson

assessments.title: Carbon Footprint Assessment - Recycled Rubber Sole
assessments.description: Detailed carbon footprint analysis for recycled rubber sole manufacturing
assessments.creator: Lisa Chang

responses.questionText: What is the carbon footprint of the recycling process (kg CO2e per kg)?
responses.answerText: 2.8 kg CO2e per kg of recycled rubber
